page.title: 05A DAY IN LEIGH'S LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7.30,wash and have breakfast.My Dad goes to work and I get dressed in my school uniform.For breakfast I usually have cereal and toast and tea or coffee. At 8.40 I leave the house and call for my friend Claire.We walk to school and at 9.00 we have registration.After assembly we work until break at 10.40.At 11.00 we go back to class until 12.00.I have school dinner,but some have sandwiches or go home.We play until 1.10,then return to class and work until 3.10.I go home and watch T.V.and have my dinner.I play on the computer and at 6.30 my Dad comes home.My sister and I put nightdresses on,watch T.V.for about 1\ hours,have supper and at 8.30 go to bed.At weekends I play with my friends,watch T.V.and go on outings by car with my family.
